sect1.screen: Estimated build time: 0.1 SBU Estimated required disk space: 2.6 MB

sect2.title: Installation of Gzip
sect2.para: The gzexe script has the location of the gzip binary hard-wired into it. Because we later change the location of the binary, the following command assures that the new location gets placed into the script:
And move the programs to the /bin directory:

screen.userinput: mv /usr/bin/gzip /bin rm /usr/bin/{gunzip,zcat} ln -s gzip /bin/gunzip ln -s gzip /bin/zcat ln -s gunzip /bin/uncompress
